p: 9. Everydayness gives access to our ex-sistentiality. Everydayness is not a mere “aspect” of our ex-sistence. Even when I live my everydayness inauthentically, it still has the a priori structure of ex-sistentiality, just as inauthenticity does. In normal everydayness I am always relating to my ex-sistence; it remains a concern for me even when I flee it or forget about it.
